thread.title: Rima-Manju Warrier's Himachali avatar!
thread.title_full: Rima-Manju Warrier's Himachali avatar! - The Times of India

author: Asha Prakash
title: Rima-Manju Warrier's Himachali avatar!
text:
The shoot of Rani Padmini seems to have taken the crew on a cultural journey.
The most recent photo uploaded by the team sees Rima, Aashiq Abu and Manju Warrier dressed like Himachalis - in ethnic and colourful attire, complete with embroidered caps, shawls and heavy silver coloured jewellery.
The film, directed by Aashiq Abu, stars Rima and Manju Warrier in the leads. It remains to be seen if the shot is a part of the film or whether the team was just having a blast.
